Welcome to Unit Cell Plotter’s documentation!¶

Unit Cell Plotter¶

Plotting and manipulating images of composite microstructure.

class ucplotter.TwoPhase_RVEImage(img_path=None)¶

Two Phase RVE image

It implements all the methods related to unit cell plots and its manipulations using built in PIL module’s Image sub-module.

embed_info(fiber_value: float, matrix_value: float, init_value: float, end_value: float) → Image¶

It embeds necessary information into the image based on pixel value.
